mapper.select:
SELECT d.id, d.content, d.writer, d.symposiumId, d.stype, d.lang, u.username AS username, t.title AS typeTitle, t.msgKey AS msgKey, s.title AS sympTitle FROM SymposiumDetail d LEFT JOIN SymposiumTypes t on d.stype = t.id LEFT JOIN Symposium s on d.symposiumId = s.id LEFT JOIN users u on d.writer = u.id
symposiumId = ${symposiumId}
and d.lang = '${lang}'
order by d.stype
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SymposiumDetail ( writer, symposiumId, stype, lang, content ) VALUES ( ${writer}, ${symposiumId}, ${stype}, '${lang}', '${content}' )
